Detailed Description

Translation from R to C++ of the Broad's expectation step.

Expectation step from the R mclust package translated to C++ for the case of spherical clusters. Updating of all parameters according to Canary from Birdsuite version 1.3. For a set of points, each model in the model selection scheme will require a BroadEstepper1 instance. General idea is to use an instance to update parameter estimates by executing the member update_broad().
